descriptions:
Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths, the perfect addition to your holiday decor. This set includes 1 pcs lighted Christmas wreath with pine cones red berries, 2 pcs Christmas garland with lights, 2 pcs red Christmas bows, and 1 pcs metal hanger. 

Crafted with care, our Christmas wreaths are made from high-quality PE synthetic fir, ensuring a realistic and exquisite look. The wreaths are adorned with Xmas red bows, pine cones, and red berries, adding a touch of elegance to your home. 

Create a warm and inviting atmosphere with the charming LED lights. The warm yellow glow paired with the lifelike foliage will bring a festive ambiance to any room. Hang them on your front door, fireplace, or Christmas tree for a stunning display. 

Measuring about 106 inches long with 10 inches of diameter, the battery-operated Christmas garland is perfect for adding a touch of holiday spirit to any space. Each garland has 315 branch tips, providing a full and lush appearance. The Xmas wreath measures about 17.72 inches in diameter, making it the ideal size for any door or wall. 

Don't miss out on this wonderful opportunity to enhance your Christmas decorations. Order the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths today and let the bright red bows and festive ambiance bring joy and cheer to your home.

Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths, the perfect addition to your holiday decor! This set includes 1 lighted Christmas wreath with pine cones and red berries, 2 Christmas garlands with lights, 2 red Christmas bows, and 1 metal hanger. 

Crafted with care, our Christmas wreaths are made of high-quality PE synthetic fir and PVC material, giving you incredibly realistic spruce branch tips. The wreaths are adorned with a festive red bow, pine cones, and red berries, adding a lifelike and elegant touch to your Christmas decorations.

Create a warm and inviting atmosphere in your home with these stunning Christmas wreaths. Hang them on your front door, fireplace, or porch to instantly transform your space into a winter wonderland. They are also perfect for decorating homes, shops, hotels, and Christmas parties.

The charming LED lights add a magical touch to these wreaths. With a warm yellow glow, they create a cozy ambiance that is perfect for the holiday season. Hang them on doors, windows, fireplaces, or anywhere you like to fill your home with joyous holiday light.

The garland measures approximately 106 inches long with a diameter of 10 inches and features 315 branch tips. The Christmas wreath has a diameter of about 17.72 inches, and the red bow measures approximately 23.6 x 13.8 inches. The bright red color of the bow brings a strong Christmas atmosphere to your space.

Don't miss out on these amazing Christmas wreaths that will bring joy and cheer to your home. Order yours today and make this holiday season truly memorable!

Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below.

---

powered by battery; garland size: 106 inches long with 10 inches of diameter; each gerland 315 branch tips, Xmas wreath size: 17.72 inches in diameter; red bow size: 23.6 x 13.8 inches
